settings.text:
At Voxtur Bio Limited, we are proud to be a front-runner in innovative, indigenously manufactured technologies for In-Vitro Diagnostic (IVD) test kits and reagents. Headquartered in Palghar, Maharashtra, we are committed to redefining diagnostic excellence in India and beyond.

A key driver of our success is our DSIR-approved in-house R&D department, which has enabled us to develop advanced and sophisticated technologies that deliver high-quality diagnostic solutions. This unwavering emphasis on innovation ensures that our products meet the dynamic needs of healthcare professionals.

At Voxtur Bio, we don’t just manufacture diagnostic tools—we pioneer solutions that empower healthcare, improve outcomes and shape a healthier future.
